name: CCBDihydropyridines
title: CCB dihydropyridines
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Medications containing a dihydropyridine calcium channel blocker),(Data Element Scope: DRUG_CLASS_MEMBERS: PHARMACOLOGIC:),(Inclusion Criteria: RxCUIs that are prescribable and contain amlodipine, felodipine, isradipine, nicardipine, nifedipine, or nisoldipine),(Exclusion Criteria: Invalid RxCUIs)
